Messages.Content: (versp‰tetes) UPDATE: Die Vorlesung findet nun doch im Professor M¸llers B¸ro im ER 373 statt!

Messages.Author: Wolf-Christian M¸ller
Messages.Content: Dear students,  please fill out the evaluation questionnaire regarding the plasma astrophysics lecture before 29 June 2024.  It is available at https://befragung.tu-berlin.de/evasys/online.php?pswd=47E2V  Best regards Wolf-Christian M¸ller
